sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,A.CINC_GLBL_WH_CD ,A.INTFC_STK_OUT_DT ,CASE WHEN A.CINC_SHIP_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cincShipToGlblCmpyCd# THEN NULL ELSE A.CINC_SHIP_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD END AS CINC_SHIP_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD ,A.CINC_RCV_GLBL_WH_CD ,CASE WHEN A.CINC_BILL_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cincShipToGlblCmpyCd# THEN NULL ELSE A.CINC_BILL_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD END AS CINC_BILL_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD ,A.CINC_GLBL_CMPY_CATG_CD ,A.INTFC_PRT_MDSE_CD ,A.PRT_SIZE_TXT ,A.CINC_GLBL_SHPG_METH_CD ,A.CINC_GLBL_SHPG_CATG_CD ,A.CINC_GLBL_ORD_CATG_CD ,A.PRT_CHRG_IND ,A.CINC_DSPL_RSN_CD ,A.INTFC_STK_OUT_QTY_SGN_TXT ,SUM(NVL(A.INTFC_STK_OUT_QTY, 0)) AS INTFC_STK_OUT_QTY ,A.INTFC_CRAT_DT FROM PRT_STK_OUT_RSLT_WRK A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.INTFC_CRAT_DT = #intfcCratDt# GROUP BY A.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,A.CINC_GLBL_WH_CD ,A.INTFC_STK_OUT_DT ,A.CINC_SHIP_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD ,A.CINC_RCV_GLBL_WH_CD ,A.CINC_BILL_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD ,A.CINC_GLBL_CMPY_CATG_CD ,A.INTFC_PRT_MDSE_CD ,A.PRT_SIZE_TXT ,A.CINC_GLBL_SHPG_METH_CD ,A.CINC_GLBL_SHPG_CATG_CD ,A.CINC_GLBL_ORD_CATG_CD ,A.PRT_CHRG_IND ,A.CINC_DSPL_RSN_CD ,A.INTFC_STK_OUT_QTY_SGN_TXT ,A.INTFC_CRAT_DT ORDER BY A.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,A.CINC_GLBL_WH_CD ,A.INTFC_STK_OUT_DT ,A.CINC_SHIP_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD ,A.CINC_RCV_GLBL_WH_CD ,A.CINC_BILL_TO_GLBL_CMPY_CD ,A.CINC_GLBL_CMPY_CATG_CD ,A.INTFC_PRT_MDSE_CD ,A.PRT_SIZE_TXT ,A.CINC_GLBL_SHPG_METH_CD ,A.CINC_GLBL_SHPG_CATG_CD ,A.CINC_GLBL_ORD_CATG_CD ,A.PRT_CHRG_IND ,A.CINC_DSPL_RSN_CD
